PageTitle: reset qos hard-pipe statistics interface outbound
FuncDef: The reset qos hard-pipe statistics interface outbound command clears hard pipe statistics about outgoing traffic on a PW-side or AC-side hard pipe interface.
CLIs: reset qos hard-pipe statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } outbound

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type and an interface number.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset qos hard-pipe statistics interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0 outbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear hard pipe statistics of outgoing traffic on a PW-side or AC-side hard pipe interface, run the reset qos hard-pipe statistics command.
